Text:
Another great upload from PHR!
Many thanks m8! Just keep the great encoded episodes come!

@kipenz:  Yeah, I'm still here.  There was a thrilling altercation involving hordes of pirates, ninjas, zombies and PEZ dispensers... but that's a tale too detailed for a comment on TPB.

ZR and YayPonies only just released #23 and 24 yesterday.  I'll post the torrents in an hour or two.

@PHR
Glad to hear.
Now for me to get downloading.

Oh, and for us uniform filenamers, here's this ep's:
